item.title: basic rgee - Best practices
item.description: Adapted from Google Earth Engine Documentation. This doc describes coding practices that are intended to maximize the chance of success for complex or expensive Earth Engine computations. addClassKlippyToPreCode(); addClassKlippyTo("pre.r, pre.markdown"); addKlippy('right', 'top', 'auto', '1', 'Click to copy', 'Done'); 1. Avoid mixing client functions and objects with server functions and objects Earth Engine server objects are objects with constructors that start with ee (e.g.Â ee$Image, ee$Reducer) and any methods on such objects are server functions.
